Comments_List: How to write a research paper and do research
Your experience varies with your advisor.

It all really depends on your advisor! Pick someone who is more than just knowledgable about your topic of research. You probably want an advisor who will provide regular and constructive feedback and who will consistently push you to improve all parts of your project. I was thoughtful in seeking out these things, and had a tremendously fulfilling experience as a result!

If you need to fulfill the senior requirement for S&DS I would highly recommend this course. It really gives you the chance to work independently with help from an advisor, and its the perfect opportunity to work on something you are passionate about.
